trans-unit.source: Scales an object in the three-dimensional x-y-z plane, starting from a defined center point.
trans-unit.target: 縮放物件中定義的中心點開始的三維 x-y-z 平面。

trans-unit.source: Scale factors are defined in x-, y-, and z- directions from this center point.
trans-unit.target: 縮放比例會定義在 x、 y 和 z 方向從這個中心點。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D"></xref> class using the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D"></xref>類別使用指定<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Vector3D along which the transformation scales.
trans-unit.target: 沿著此轉換縮放的 Vector3D。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D"></xref> class using the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D"></xref>類別使用指定<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D"></xref>和<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Vector3D along which the transformation scales.
trans-unit.target: 沿著此轉換縮放的 Vector3D。

trans-unit.source: Center around which the transformation scales.
trans-unit.target: 轉換縮放周圍的中心。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D"></xref> class using the specified scale factors.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D"></xref>類別使用指定的縮放因數。

trans-unit.source: Factor by which to scale the X value.
trans-unit.target: 要調整 X 值的因數。

trans-unit.source: Factor by which to scale the Y value.
trans-unit.target: 要縮放的 Y 值的比例。

trans-unit.source: Factor by which to scale the Z value.
trans-unit.target: 縮放的 Z 值所用的因數。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D"></xref> class using the specified center coordinates and scale factors.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D"></xref>類別使用的座標指定的中心和縮放比例。

trans-unit.source: Factor by which to scale the X value.
trans-unit.target: 要調整 X 值的因數。

trans-unit.source: Factor by which to scale the Y value.
trans-unit.target: 要縮放的 Y 值的比例。

trans-unit.source: Factor by which to scale the Z value.
trans-unit.target: 縮放的 Z 值所用的因數。

trans-unit.source: X coordinate of the center point from which to scale.
trans-unit.target: 從要縮放的中心點的 x 座標。

trans-unit.source: Y coordinate of the center point from which to scale.
trans-unit.target: 中心點縮放的 Y 座標。

trans-unit.source: Z coordinate of the center point from which to scale.
trans-unit.target: 中心點縮放的 Z 座標。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the x-coordinate of the transform's center point.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定轉換中心點的 x 座標。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the transform's center point.
trans-unit.target: 轉換中心點的 x 座標。

trans-unit.source: The default value is `0`.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 `0`。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D.CenterX*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D.CenterX*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D.CenterX*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the z-coordinate of the transform's center point.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定轉換中心點的 z 座標。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the transform's center point.
trans-unit.target: 轉換中心點的 y 座標。

trans-unit.source: The default value is `0`.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 `0`。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D.CenterY*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D.CenterY*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D.CenterY*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the z-coordinate of the transform's center point.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定轉換中心點的 z 座標。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The z-coordinate of the transform's center point.
trans-unit.target: 轉換中心點的 z 座標。

trans-unit.source: The default value is `0`.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 `0`。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D.CenterZ*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D.CenterZ*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D.CenterZ*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 建立可修改複製品這個<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D"> </xref>，製作這個物件值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 （但可能已不能再解析），但不是動畫或它們目前的值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: 複製的物件<> *> 屬性會是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使來源的<> *> 屬性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 建立可修改複製品這個<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D"></xref>物件，製作這個物件目前值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不會複製資源參考、 資料繫結和動畫，但是其目前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 複製的物件<> *> 屬性會是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使來源的<> *> 屬性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the scale factor in the x-direction.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 x 方向的縮放比例。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: Scale factor in the x-direction.
trans-unit.target: X 方向的縮放比例。

trans-unit.source: The default value is `1`.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 `1`。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D.ScaleX*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D.ScaleX*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D.ScaleX*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: Scale factor in the y-direction.
trans-unit.target: Y 方向的縮放比例。

trans-unit.source: The default value is `1`.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 `1`。

trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D.ScaleY*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D.ScaleY*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: Scale factor in the z-direction.
trans-unit.target: Z 方向的縮放比例。

trans-unit.source: The default value is `1`.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 `1`。

trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D.ScaleZ*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D.ScaleZ*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref> representation of this transformation.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref>此轉換的表示法。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref> representation of this transformation.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref>此轉換的表示法。
